column4: anyone able to give some support with tesdisk and recovering an ubuntu partition?
anyone able to give some support with tesdisk and recovering a lost ubuntu partition
can you please define "messed with things"
don't want an image, just explain the current situation and what happened to get it there
is the ubuntu partition still there ?
great, I'll give you a url
check the URL ubottu just sent you, it will walk you through re-applying grub
what do you mean "it's still there"
try to mount the partition from the livecd/liveusb
I told you 3 times not to send the image, answer the question
if it is actually free space, then your partition and data is gone
if it's not free space, mount it and confirm the data is ok
